PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2001-01572001-01-300,  ,  ,  TC, 
PrecisApproval of Regulations Amending the AIR TRANSPORTATION REGULATIONS which require air carriers to serve official notice 120 days before discontinuing certain non-stop scheduled flights between two points in Canada, and enable the Agency to order air carriers to issue refunds (with interest) to customers who have been overcharged.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2001-0071 Publication Date: 2001-02-14
